channel.title: Router help!
channel.description:
k i was following the ''Ultimate Server guide'' in the tutorials, and it said to go to your router and stuff and click on gaming. but i have a linksys router and it doesnt say gaming anywhere. and i was in advanced. any help? thx
edit::move to rs2 server development/help pl0x

item.title: Router help!
item.dc:creator: @iwubmopar iwubmopar
item.description:
@iwubmopar wrote:

this is under port range forward in the appications and gaming tab right? and what what should i put for the application and the protocol part?

Read full topic

item.title: Router help!
item.dc:creator: @Coyle Coyle
item.description:
@Coyle wrote:

ok right another thing to add ok? where it says Ip Address you add your routers IP address, to find this out you go to start runâ€¦

type cmd and press enter
then when a black screen appears type in Ipconfig

this will show you your ip address for your router.

then add that to the ip part there.

some problems you may encounter are, if you share a network with people I think the first computer turned on takes the first ip address for instance

192.168.1.10 is your Ip
and you have 2 computers

the first computer turned on in the network will recieve the ip 192.168.1.10
while the other will recieve 192.168.1.11 and so on
this makes it difficult to allow otherplayers on your server when your computer isnt switched on first/second everytime

-Coyle

Read full topic

item.title: Router help!
item.dc:creator: @iwubmopar iwubmopar
item.description:
@iwubmopar wrote:

i dont have a server yet. but i changed my firewall to allow a port 43594

andalos, what should i put fo the apllication part, the enable part, and the protocol and ip address part

and this is under port range forward in the appications and gaming tab right?

Read full topic

item.title: Router help!
item.dc:creator: @Coyle Coyle
item.description:
@Coyle wrote:

right you see the starting port and ending port? change that to your servers default port which unless you changed it then it will be 43594.

-Coyle

Read full topic

item.title: Router help!
item.dc:creator: @Coyle Coyle
item.description:
@Coyle wrote:

you must go to applications and gaming in a tab
you will find this using your browser and typing 192.168.1.1
and typing in your password.
username blank
password admin
are defaults I think

the start port and end port must be the same
-Coyle

Read full topic
